title: Credit slows down across sectors in June except loans to corporates and housing
description: RBI data for June 2024 indicated a slowdown in credit growth across sectors, except for large corporates, housing, and gold loans. Loans to large corporates grew 7.7% year-on-year. Housing loans saw significant acceleration, while retail loans and services experienced a decline. Credit to agriculture remained strong but was lower than the previous year.
